newsitem.title: USA: Claire's to meet or exceed $0.15 shr in Q3.
newsitem.headline: Claire's to meet or exceed $0.15 shr in Q3.

text.p: Claire's Stores Inc said Wednesday that it expects third quarter earnings to meet or exceed analysts' expectations of $0.15 per share.
The company's third quarter ends November 2. It said the year-ago third quarter saw earnings of $0.11 per share.

"We have set sales and earnings records in the first and second quarters of this year. We'll set new records in the third quarter, and we're confident that the fourth quarter will see a continuation of that pace," the company stated.
The company said it will release third quarter figures November 12.
